DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an Attack card this turn, the targeted enemy loses HP.

DarkestMod:PowerLight.NAME: Torch Light
DESCRIPTIONS: Current Light level is #b
NL At + 7 gain + 1 Dexterity
NL At -7  gain +1 Strength & +1 Vulnerable per turn.

DESCRIPTIONS: Your next attack does 4 less damage.
